decision_conditions: The proposal in terms of design, height, scale and bulk is considered to cause harm to the character and appearance of the host building and the surrounding area and is not consistent with policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), policy 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Ealing Housing Guidance (2022). | The proposed side extension and upper roof terrace due to their siting, height and proximity to the terrace at No.6 Hoopers Mews are considered to incur unacceptable impacts on neighbours in terms of loss of light, sense of enclosure and overbearing unneighbourly development in conflict with policy 7B of the Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Construction of a second floor (mansard level) including the creation of a terrace/balcony; first floor side extension, including the creation of a terrace/balcony; and insertion of a window to the first floor rear elevation.
